title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
Colin looks at the criticism Russell Wilson is receiving and argues the "dynasty" during his time with the Seahawks was destined to fail from the beginning. He points out that legendary head coach Bill Belichick has clearly changed his philosophy after winning 6 Super Bowls and losing Tom Brady. He also defends Jimmy Garoppolo and proves his ability to win games in the NFL. Plus, Greg Cosell from NFL Films joins the show to praise Trevor Lawrence for the improvements he's made in year 2 and breaking down the wild shootout between the Dolphins and the Ravens.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
